$$$DOC.text:
This is the ISPPLIB library for Jeff Kaplan's collection of software.

This collection is currently in the condition of 'hodge-podge',
however, there is much useful material here.

    File 252 contains Jeff Kaplan's   SOURCE   library
    File 253 contains Jeff Kaplan's   EXEC     library
    File 254 contains Jeff Kaplan's   CNTL     library
    File 255 contains Jeff Kaplan's   ISPPLIB  library
    File 256 contains Jeff Kaplan's   ISPTLIB  library

Nothing is GUARANTEED to work anywhere else.  The user will have to
-------
              "look and try".......    However, there is much good
              code in this collection, including numerous direct
              calls to SVC 26.

   I am (sort of) an intermediary between Jeff Kaplan and the public.
However, his direct work phone is:  215-633-4614.

   If you can't reach Jeff at work, please try:

          Sam Golob
          P.O. Box 423
          Howell, New Jersey  07731-0423
          908-901-0943
          718-403-8666   daytime

Note:  Jeff's CNTL library also contains Assembler Source and REXX
       execs.  Please explore ALL files in this collection.  As of
       this cut of the tape, I have not sifted through all of Jeff's
       stuff and straightened it out.  There may also be some
       duplication of source code or REXX execs.

$CCFASMB.text:
)ATTR
  ! TYPE(OUTPUT)  INTENS(HIGH) SKIP(ON)
  + TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(LOW) SKIP(ON)
  % TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(HIGH) SKIP(ON)
  _ TYPE(INPUT)   INTENS(HIGH) CAPS(ON)
)BODY
%------ BUILDING DEPOSIT LIB/CCF BATCH ASSEMBLE/COMPILE SERVICES --------------
%COMMAND ===>_ZCMD                                                     +
+
% LIBRARIAN MASTER DATASET:
+     PROJECT ===>_LIBPRJ  +
+     GROUP   ===>_LIBGRP  +
+     TYPE    ===>_LIBTYP  +
+     MEMBER  ===>_MEMBER  +         ACCOUNT CODE:_ACCTCDE         +
+
% SELECT COMPILE TYPE ===>_Z+ (1 THRU 5)
%     1.+  ASSEMBLE/LINKEDT BAL PROGRAM
%     2.+  COMPILE/LINKEDT COBOL-II PROGRAM   %COMPILE ONLY: _Z+ (Y/N)
%     3.+  COMPILE/LINKEDT DYL280 PROGRAM
%     4.+  COMPILE/LINKEDT RPGIAUTO PROGRAM
%     5.+  COMPILE/LINKEDT RPGII PROGRAM
+
+ COBOL2 COMPILE OPTIONS:
+ _C2P                                                          +|
+ LOADLIB ===>_CCFLOAD                                     +|
+
+ SYSLIB DD COPYBOOK SEARCH CHAIN:
%   1.+ _COPYLB1                        %2.+_COPYLB2                  +
%   3.+ _COPYLB3                        %4.+_COPYLB4                  +
%  ENTER KEY = SUBMIT - PF3|PF15 = END/CANCEL - PF1|PF13 = MESSAGE HELP.
)INIT
  .ZVARS = '(COMPTYP CMPONLY)'
  .HELP = $CCFHASM
 IF (&ZERRMSG ¬= ' ') .MSG = &ZERRMSG
  IF (&CURSOR = ' ')
    &CURSOR = MEMBER
    IF (&LIBTYP = ' ')
      &CURSOR = LIBTYP
    IF (&LIBGRP = ' ')
      &CURSOR = LIBGRP
    IF (&LIBPRJ = ' ')
      &CURSOR = LIBPRJ
    .CURSOR = &CURSOR
    &COMPTYP = ' '
    &CMPONLY = 'N'
)PROC
  VER (&LIBPRJ,DSNAME)
  VER (&LIBGRP,DSNAME)
  VER (&LIBTYP,DSNAME)
  VER (&MEMBER,NAME)
  VER (&ACCTCDE,NONBLANK,PICT,NNNNNNNNNNNNNNNN)
  VER (&COMPTYP,NONBLANK)
  VER (&COMPTYP,RANGE,1,5)
  VER (&CMPONLY,LIST,Y,N)
  VER (&CCFLOAD,NONBLANK)
  VER (&COPYLB1,DSNAME)
  VER (&COPYLB2,DSNAME)
  VER (&COPYLB3,DSNAME)
  VER (&COPYLB4,DSNAME)
  VPUT (LIBPRJ,LIBGRP,LIBTYP,ACCTCDE,C2P) PROFILE
)END

$CCFASMC.text:
)ATTR
  ! TYPE(OUTPUT)  INTENS(HIGH) SKIP(ON)
  + TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(LOW) SKIP(ON)
  % TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(HIGH) SKIP(ON)
  _ TYPE(INPUT)   INTENS(HIGH) CAPS(ON)
)BODY
%------- BUILDING DEPOSIT LIB/CCF CICS ASSEMBLE/COMPILE SERVICES --------------
%COMMAND ===>_ZCMD                                                     +
+
% LIBRARIAN MASTER DATASET:
+     PROJECT ===>_LIBPRJ  +
+     GROUP   ===>_LIBGRP  +
+     TYPE    ===>_LIBTYP  +
+     MEMBER  ===>_MEMBER  +         ACCOUNT CODE:_ACCTCDE         +
+
% SELECT COMPILE TYPE ===>_Z+ (1 THRU 6)
%     1.+  ASSEMBLE/LINKEDT BAL CICS MACRO PROGRAM
%     2.+  ASSEMBLE/LINKEDT BMSMAP PROGRAM        %MAP ONLY: _Z+ (Y/N)
%     3.+  COMPILE/LINKEDT CICS COBOL2 PROGRAM    %XPEDITER: _Z+ (Y/N)
%     4.+  ASSEMBLE/LINKEDT DMSMAP PROGRAM
%     5.+  COMPILE ONLY - CICS COBOL2 PROGRAM
%     6.+  COMPILE/TRANSLATE CICS COBOL2 COPYBOOK
+
+ LOADLIB ===>_CCFLOAD                                     +|
+
+ SYSLIB DD COPYBOOK SEARCH CHAIN:
%   1.+ _COPYLB1                        %2.+_COPYLB2                  +
%   3.+ _COPYLB3                        %4.+_COPYLB4                  +
+
%  ENTER KEY = SUBMIT - PF3|PF15 = END/CANCEL - PF1|PF13 = MESSAGE HELP.
)INIT
  .ZVARS = '(COMPTYP MAPONLY INTRTST)'
  .HELP = $CCFHASM
 IF (&ZERRMSG ¬= ' ') .MSG = &ZERRMSG
  IF (&CURSOR = ' ')
    &CURSOR = MEMBER
    IF (&LIBTYP = ' ')
      &CURSOR = LIBTYP
    IF (&LIBGRP = ' ')
      &CURSOR = LIBGRP
    IF (&LIBPRJ = ' ')
      &CURSOR = LIBPRJ
    .CURSOR = &CURSOR
    &COMPTYP = ' '
    &MAPONLY = 'Y'
    &INTRTST = 'Y'
)PROC
  VER (&LIBPRJ,DSNAME)
  VER (&LIBGRP,DSNAME)
  VER (&LIBTYP,DSNAME)
  VER (&MEMBER,NAME)
  VER (&ACCTCDE,NONBLANK,PICT,NNNNNNNNNNNNNNNN)
  VER (&COMPTYP,NONBLANK)
  VER (&COMPTYP,RANGE,1,6)
  VER (&MAPONLY,LIST,Y,N)
  VER (&INTRTST,LIST,Y,N)
  VER (&CCFLOAD,NONBLANK)
  VER (&COPYLB1,DSNAME)
  VER (&COPYLB2,DSNAME)
  VER (&COPYLB3,DSNAME)
  VER (&COPYLB4,DSNAME)
  VPUT (LIBPRJ,LIBGRP,LIBTYP,ACCTCDE,CCFLOAD) PROFILE
)END

)ATTR

%------ BUILDING DEPOSIT LIB/CCF BATCH ASSEMBLE/COMPILE SERVICES --------------

      &CURSOR = LIBTYP

      &CURSOR = LIBGRP
    IF (&LIBPRJ = ' ')
      &CURSOR = LIBPRJ

    &COMPTYP = ' '

)PROC
  VER (&LIBPRJ,DSNAME)
  VER (&LIBGRP,DSNAME)
  VER (&LIBTYP,DSNAME)
  VER (&MEMBER,NAME)

  VER (&COMPTYP,RANGE,1,5)
  VER (&CMPONLY,LIST,Y,N)
  VER (&QACOMP,LIST,Y,N)
  VER (&CCFLOAD,NONBLANK)
  VER (&COPYLB1,DSNAME)
  VER (&COPYLB2,DSNAME)
  VER (&COPYLB3,DSNAME)
  VER (&COPYLB4,DSNAME)
  VPUT (LIBPRJ,LIBGRP,LIBTYP,ACCTCDE) PROFILE

$CCFBHP1.text:
)ATTR
  ! TYPE(OUTPUT)  INTENS(HIGH) SKIP(ON)
  + TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(LOW) SKIP(ON)
  % TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(HIGH) SKIP(ON)
  _ TYPE(INPUT)   INTENS(HIGH) CAPS(ON)
)BODY
%------ BUILDING DEPOSIT LIB/CCF BATCH ASSEMBLE/COMPILE SERVICES --------------
%COMMAND ===>_ZCMD                                                     +
+
% LIBRARIAN MASTER DATASET:
%   PROJECT ===>    +( always %SYS1+ high-level qualifier )
%   GROUP   ===>    +( %TESTSRCE | RJCTSRCE | EMRGSRCE | PRODSRCE+ )
%   TYPE    ===>    +( always %MASTER+ low-level qualifier )
%   MEMBER  ===>    +( name of Librarian source member to be compiled )
%   ACCOUNT CODE:   +( valid job accounting code for which you are authorized )
+
% SELECT COMPILE TYPE ===>   +(1 THRU 5)    %TURNOVER COMPILE:  +(Y|N)
%   1.+COMPILE/LINKEDT COBOL-II PROGRAM     %COMPILE ONLY:      +(Y|N)
%   2.+COMPILE/LINKEDT DYL280 PROGRAM       %3.+ASSEMBLE/LINKEDT BAL PROGRAM
%   4.+COMPILE/LINKEDT RPGIAUTO PROGRAM     %5.+COMPILE/LINKEDIT RPGII PROGRAM
+
%*+Specify compile option by entering the corresponding number of the
+  associated compile task as presented above.
%*+TURNOVER COMPILE should always be specified as %Y+ for final compile for
+  turnover implemetation.
%*+COMPILE ONLY option is available for COBOL programs only.
+
%                  -- continued on next panel --  hit enter ...
)PROC
  IF (&ZCMD = ' ') &ZCONT = $CCFBHP2
  &ZUP = $CCFBHP2
)END

$CCFBHP2.text:
)ATTR
  ! TYPE(OUTPUT)  INTENS(HIGH) SKIP(ON)
  + TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(LOW) SKIP(ON)
  % TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(HIGH) SKIP(ON)
  _ TYPE(INPUT)   INTENS(HIGH) CAPS(ON)
)BODY
%COMMAND ===>_ZCMD                                                     +
+
% COBOL2 AND CA-OPTIMIZER COMPILE OPTIONS: +
%*+Specified compile options are retained as dialog PROFILE variables.
%*+CA-optimizer compile options are displayed whenever the OPT2-FLAG indicator
% +is present in the COBOL program WORKING-STORAGE SECTION.
+                                                               +|
% LOADLIB ===>     +( default: %SYS1.TEST.BATCH.LOADLIB+ )
%*+Up to a 44 character dataset name can be specified.
+
% COPYBOOK LIBRARIAN DATASET NODES:   ( SELECT UP TO 4 BY NUMBER )
%   ( 1=TESTCOPY  2=TURNCOPY  3=QACOPY  4=PRODCOPY  5=RJCTCOPY  6=EMRGCOPY )
% SYSLIB DD COPYBOOK SEARCH CHAIN:    1.       2.       3.       4.
+
%*+The COPYBOOK SYSLIB DD search concatenation is specified by
+  entering the corresponding number of the Librarian dataset node in
+  prioritized search sequence.
+
%         E N D   O F   H E L P   P A N E L   ( PF3 = RETURN )
)PROC
)END

$CCFBPNL.text:
)ATTR
  ! TYPE(OUTPUT)  INTENS(HIGH) SKIP(ON)
  + TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(LOW) SKIP(ON)
  % TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(HIGH) SKIP(ON)
  _ TYPE(INPUT)   INTENS(HIGH) CAPS(ON)
)BODY
%--- BUILDING DEPOSIT LIB/CCF COBOL2 AND DYLAKOR DB2 BATCH COMPILE SERVICES ----
%COMMAND ===>_ZCMD                                                     +
+
% LIBRARIAN MASTER DATASET:
+   PROJECT ===>_LIBPRJ  +
+   GROUP   ===>_LIBGRP  +
+   TYPE    ===>_LIBTYP  +
+   MEMBER  ===>_MEMBER  +                   ACCOUNT CODE:_ACCTCDE         +
+
% SELECT COMPILE TYPE ===>_Z+ (1 THRU 3)
%   1.+ COBOL2 PRE-COMP/COMP/LINK/PACKAGE/BIND  %PACKAGE COLL-ID ===>_DB2COLL +
%   2.+ PACKAGE PROGRAM ONLY                %3.+ BIND PROGRAM ONLY
%      %TURNOVER COMPILE: _Z+  (Y/N)        %WORKORDER NUMBER: _WORKORDR+  WO...
%   4.+ DYLAKOR COMPILE/PRE-COMPILE/ASSEMBLE/LINK/BIND
+
% COBOL2 COMPILE OPTIONS:
+ _DB2OPT                                                       +|
% LOADLIB ===>_CCFLOAD                                     +|
% COPYBOOK AND DCLLIB LIBRARIAN DATASET NODES:    +( select any 4 nodes )
+   ( 1=TESTCOPY  2=TURNCOPY  3=RJCTCOPY  4=QACOPY  5=PRODCOPY  6=EMRGCOPY )
% SYSLIB DD COPYBOOK SEARCH CHAIN:   %1._Z+   %2._Z+   %3._Z+   %4._Z+
% SYSLIB DD DCLLIB SEARCH CHAIN:     %1._Z+   %2._Z+   %3._Z+   %4._Z+
)INIT
  .ZVARS = '(COMPTYP QACOMP C1 C2 C3 C4 D1 D2 D3 D4)'
  .HELP = $CCFDHP1
 IF (&ZERRMSG ¬= ' ') .MSG = &ZERRMSG
  IF (&CURSOR = ' ')
    &CURSOR = MEMBER
    IF (&LIBTYP = ' ')
      &CURSOR = LIBTYP
    IF (&LIBGRP = ' ')
      &CURSOR = LIBGRP
    IF (&LIBPRJ = ' ')
      &CURSOR = LIBPRJ
    .CURSOR = &CURSOR
    &COMPTYP = ' '
)PROC
  VER (&LIBPRJ,DSNAME)
  VER (&LIBGRP,DSNAME)
  VER (&LIBTYP,DSNAME)
  VER (&MEMBER,NAME)
  VER (&ACCTCDE,NONBLANK,PICT,NNNNNNNNNNNNNNNN)
  VER (&COMPTYP,NONBLANK)
  VER (&COMPTYP,RANGE,1,4)
  VER (&QACOMP,LIST,Y,N)
  VER (&CCFLOAD,NONBLANK)
  VER (&C1,NONBLANK)
  VER (&C2,NONBLANK)
  VER (&C3,NONBLANK)
  VER (&C4,NONBLANK)
  VER (&D1,NONBLANK)
  VER (&D2,NONBLANK)
  VER (&D3,NONBLANK)
  VER (&D4,NONBLANK)
  IF (&COMPTYP ¬= 4)
    VER (&DB2COLL,NONBLANK)
  IF (&QACOMP = Y)
    VER (&DB2COLL,NONBLANK)
    VER (&WORKORDR,NONBLANK)
  VPUT (LIBPRJ,LIBGRP,LIBTYP,ACCTCDE) PROFILE
)END

    &COMPTYP = ' '
)PROC
  VER (&LIBPRJ,DSNAME)
  VER (&LIBGRP,DSNAME)
  VER (&LIBTYP,DSNAME)
  VER (&MEMBER,NAME)
  VER (&ACCTCDE,NONBLANK,PICT,NNNNNNNNNNNNNNNN)
  VER (&COMPTYP,NONBLANK)
  VER (&COMPTYP,RANGE,1,2)
  VER (&LL,NONBLANK)
  VER (&LL,RANGE,1,6)
)END

 ! Application development services    ! Spool Display and Search Facility¬
 ! ISPF/PDF services                   ! Operations support¬
 ! Systems support services            ! Librarian/CCF services¬
 ! Exit services¬
@------------#Charming Shoppes ISPF/PDF Master Application Menu@------------
+
%OPTION  ===>_ZCMD
+
% System:+&ZSYSID%Userid:+&ZUSER    %LogonProc:+&ZLOGON    %Time:+&ZTIME
?SAREA --------------------------------------------------------------------?
)AREA SAREA
%Application development services
|   BR        +Browse source data
|   ED        +Edit source data
|   LIBRA     +Library PDS(E) member services
|   DAT       +Dataset services
|   COP       +Copy datasets or PDS(E) members
|   MOV       +Move datasets or PDS(E) members
|   DSL       +Dataset lists and VTOC lists
|   XDSL      +SYSpercent extended dataset list
|   IAM       +IAM dataset utitities
|   INFO      +Information system
|   SUP       +Superce compare datasets
|   SEA       +Search for strings of data
|   TSOE      +TSO/E command entry
|   DB2I      +Perform Database 2 Interactive functions
|   QMFA      +Query Management Facility Production System A
|   QMFB      +Query Management Facility Production System B
|   QMFT      +Query Management Facility Test System T
|   PHNX      +PHOENIX Computer-Based Training
|   OPT       +OPTIMIZER II
|   DOCV      +CA/Docview online documentation product
+
%Spool Display and Search Facility
|   SDS       +SDSF main menu
|   SDA       +Display active users
|   SH        +Display JES2 held output queue
|   SI        +Display JES2 input queue
|   SINIT     +Display JES2 initiators
|   SLOG      +Display JES2 system log
|   SO        +Display JES2 output queue
|   SPR       +Display JES2 system printers
|   SST       +Display JES2 job status
+
%ISPF/PDF services
|   READBK    +Bookmanager system
|   CMDA      +Command application table services
|   DIAL      +Dialog testing services
|   ISPFPARM  +ISPF terminal and user parameters
|   STA       +Reset ISPF/PDF library statistics
|   TUT       +ISPF/PDF tutorial
+
%Operations support
|   ABR       +ABR backup restore services
|   APCDDS    +Apcdds report balancer services
|   APC       +Apcdoc services
|   CADK      +Ca-Datamacs/II
|   DISP      +Dispatch services
|   DITT      +Ditto services
|   FSTA      +FDR system backup status
|   JOBSC     +Job/Scan services
|   JSX       +JES/328X print services
|   NWR       +NW LAN restore services
|   QW        +Quickref message services
|   SILO      +MIM tape management services
|   TLM       +TLMS tape management services
|   VPS       +VPS  vpsprint management services
|   ZEK       +ZEKE the scheduler
+
%Systems support services
|   PMACB     +Ca/Pma Charge Back
|   PMADM     +Ca/Pma Data Manager
|   BMCM      +Database Activity Monitor
|   DSN       +Database 2
|   HCD       +Hardware Configuration Definition services
|   ISM       +Interactive Storage Management Facility
|   IXFP      +Iceberg Extended Facilities Product
|   JPU       +CICS Production Forward Recovery Facility
|   MNV       +Boole & Babbage Mainview Manager services
|   PER       +Boole & Babbage Performance Manager services
|   RAC       +Resource Access Control Facility security management
|   RMF       +Resource Measurement Facility
|   SLR       +Service Level Reporter
|   SMP       +System Modification Program / Extended services
+
%Librarian/CCF services
|   LIBRP     +Librarian main menu
|   LIBE      +Librarian edit
|   LIBRM     +Librarian restore test member
|   COMPB     +Batch Librarian compile
|   COMPC     +CICS Librarian compile
|   CCF       +Change Control Facility main menu
|   CCFO      +CCF open request
|   CCFA      +CCF assign request
|   CCFD      +CCF display request
|   CCFLO     +CCF logout request
|   CCFLB     +CCF logout request via batch submit job
|   CCFLI     +CCF login request
|   CCFC      +CCF close request
|   CCFR      +CCF reports
|   CCFM      +CCF movement status
|   CCFJ      +CCF job status
|   CCFU      +CCF utilities
|   CCFAD     +CCF administration
|   CCFS      +CCF librarian scan
|   CCFT      +CCF tutorial
|   DB2B      +Batch DB2 Librarian compile
|   DB2C      +CICS DB2 Librarian compile
|   C370      +C compiler
+
%Exit services
|   LOGOFF    +Logoff TSO/E
|   LOGON     +Logoff and re-Logon with the same TSO/E userid
|   LOGOFFON  +Terminate ISPF/PDF and then re-enter ISPF/PDF
)INIT
  .HELP = ISR00003
  &ZPRIM = YES        /* ALWAYS A PRIMARY OPTION MENU      */
  &ZHTOP = ISR00003   /* TUTORIAL TABLE OF CONTENTS        */
  &ZHINDEX = ISR91000 /* TUTORIAL INDEX - 1ST PAGE         */
  &ZSCLMPRJ = &Z      /* TUTORIAL INDEX - 1ST PAGE         */
  VPUT (ZHTOP,ZHINDEX,ZSCLMPRJ) PROFILE
)PROC
&ZQ = &Z
  IF (&ZCMD ¬= ' ')
    &ZQ = TRUNC(&ZCMD,'.')
    IF (&ZQ = ' ')
      .MSG = ISRU000
  &ZSEL = TRANS( &ZQ
                0,'PANEL(ISPOPTA)'
                1,'PGM(ISRBRO) PARM(ISRBRO01)'
                2,'PGM(ISREDIT) PARM(P,ISREDM01)'
                3,'PANEL(ISRUTIL)'
                6,'PGM(ISRPTC)'
                7,'PGM(ISPYXDR) PARM(ISR) NOCHECK'
                T,'PGM(ISPTUTOR) PARM(ISR00000)'
                PRIM,' '
              ' ',' '
                END,'EXIT'
                X,'EXIT'
                *,'?' )
  &ZTRAIL = .TRAIL
)END

%OPTION  ===>_ZCMD
+
% System:+&ZSYSID%Userid:+&ZUSER    %LogonProc:+&ZLOGON    %Time:+&ZTIME
?SAREA --------------------------------------------------------------------?
)AREA SAREA
%Application development services
|   BR        +Browse source data
|   ED        +Edit source data
|   LIBRA     +Library PDS(E) member services
|   DAT       +Dataset services
|   COP       +Copy datasets or PDS(E) members
|   MOV       +Move datasets or PDS(E) members
|   DSL       +Dataset lists and VTOC lists
|   IAM       +IAM dataset utitities
|   READBK    +Bookmanager services
|   SUP       +Superce compare datasets
|   SEA       +Search for strings of data
|   TSOE      +TSO/E command entry
|   PHNX      +PHOENIX Computer-Based Training
+
%Spool Display and Search Facility
|   SDS       +SDSF main menu
|   SDA       +Display active users
|   SH        +Display JES2 held output queue
|   SI        +Display JES2 input queue
|   SINIT     +Display JES2 initiators
|   SLOG      +Display JES2 system log
|   SO        +Display JES2 output queue
|   SPR       +Display JES2 system printers
|   SST       +Display JES2 job status
+
%ISPF/PDF services
|   CMDA      +Command application table services
|   DIAL      +Dialog testing services
|   ISPFPARM  +ISPF terminal and user parameters
|   STA       +Reset ISPF/PDF library statistics
|   TUT       +ISPF/PDF tutorial
+
%Operations support
|   ABR       +ABR backup restore services
|   APCDDS    +Apcdds report balancer services
|   APC       +Apcdoc services
|   CADK      +Ca-Datamacs/II
|   DISP      +Dispatch services
|   DITT      +Ditto services
|   FSTA      +FDR system backup status
|   JOBSC     +Job/Scan services
|   JSX       +JES/328X print services
|   NWR       +NW LAN restore services
|   QW        +Quickref message services
|   SILO      +MIM tape management services
|   TLM       +TLMS tape management services
|   ZEK       +ZEKE the scheduler
+
%Librarian/CCF services
|   LIBRP     +Librarian main menu
|   LIBE      +Librarian edit
|   LIBRM     +Librarian restore test member
|   COMPB     +Batch Librarian compile
|   COMPC     +CICS Librarian compile
|   CCF       +Change Control Facility main menu
|   CCFO      +CCF open request
|   CCFA      +CCF assign request
|   CCFD      +CCF display request
|   CCFLO     +CCF logout request
|   CCFLB     +CCF logout request via batch submit job
|   CCFLI     +CCF login request
|   CCFC      +CCF close request
|   CCFR      +CCF reports
|   CCFM      +CCF movement status
|   CCFJ      +CCF job status
|   CCFU      +CCF utilities
|   CCFAD     +CCF administration
|   CCFS      +CCF librarian scan
|   CCFT      +CCF tutorial
|   DB2B      +Batch DB2 Librarian compile
|   DB2C      +CICS DB2 Librarian compile
+
%Exit services
|   LOGOFF    +Logoff TSO/E
|   LOGON     +Logoff and re-Logon with the same TSO/E userid
|   LOGOFFON  +Terminate ISPF/PDF and then re-enter ISPF/PDF
)INIT
  .HELP = ISR00003
  &ZPRIM = YES        /* ALWAYS A PRIMARY OPTION MENU      */
  &ZHTOP = ISR00003   /* TUTORIAL TABLE OF CONTENTS        */
  &ZHINDEX = ISR91000 /* TUTORIAL INDEX - 1ST PAGE         */
  &ZSCLMPRJ = &Z      /* TUTORIAL INDEX - 1ST PAGE         */
  VPUT (ZHTOP,ZHINDEX,ZSCLMPRJ) PROFILE
)PROC
&ZQ = &Z
  IF (&ZCMD ¬= ' ')
    &ZQ = TRUNC(&ZCMD,'.')
    IF (&ZQ = ' ')
      .MSG = ISRU000
  &ZSEL = TRANS( &ZQ
                0,'PANEL(ISPOPTA)'
                1,'PGM(ISRBRO) PARM(ISRBRO01)'
                2,'PGM(ISREDIT) PARM(P,ISREDM01)'
                3,'PANEL(ISRUTIL)'
                6,'PGM(ISRPTC)'
                7,'PGM(ISPYXDR) PARM(ISR) NOCHECK'
                T,'PGM(ISPTUTOR) PARM(ISR00000)'
                PRIM,' '
              ' ',' '
                END,'EXIT'
                X,'EXIT'
                *,'?' )
  &ZTRAIL = .TRAIL
)END

 ! Systems support services            ! Librarian/CCF services¬
 ! Exit services¬
@------------#Charming Shoppes ISPF/PDF Master Application Menu@------------
+
%OPTION  ===>_ZCMD
+
% System:+&ZSYSID%Userid:+&ZUSER    %LogonProc:+&ZLOGON    %Time:+&ZTIME
?SAREA --------------------------------------------------------------------?
)AREA SAREA
%Application development services
|   BR        +Browse source data
|   ED        +Edit source data
|   LIBRA     +Library PDS(E) member services
|   DAT       +Dataset services
|   COP       +Copy datasets or PDS(E) members
|   MOV       +Move datasets or PDS(E) members
|   DSL       +Dataset lists and VTOC lists
|   XDSL      +SYSpercent extended dataset list
|   IAM       +IAM dataset utitities
|   INFO      +Information system
|   SUP       +Superce compare datasets
|   SEA       +Search for strings of data
|   TSOE      +TSO/E command entry
|   DB2I      +Perform Database 2 Interactive functions
|   QMFA      +Query Management Facility Production System A
|   QMFB      +Query Management Facility Production System B
|   QMFT      +Query Management Facility Test System T
|   PHNX      +PHOENIX Computer-Based Training
|   OPT       +OPTIMIZER II
|   DOCV      +CA/Docview online documentation product
+
%Spool Display and Search Facility
|   SDS       +SDSF main menu
|   SDA       +Display active users
|   SH        +Display JES2 held output queue
|   SI        +Display JES2 input queue
|   SINIT     +Display JES2 initiators
|   SLOG      +Display JES2 system log
|   SO        +Display JES2 output queue
|   SPR       +Display JES2 system printers
|   SST       +Display JES2 job status
+
%ISPF/PDF services
|   READBK    +Bookmanager system
|   CMDA      +Command application table services
|   DIAL      +Dialog testing services
|   ISPFPARM  +ISPF terminal and user parameters
|   STA       +Reset ISPF/PDF library statistics
|   TUT       +ISPF/PDF tutorial
+
%Operations support
|   ABR       +ABR backup restore services
|   APCDDS    +Apcdds report balancer services
|   APC       +Apcdoc services
|   DISP      +Dispatch services
|   DITT      +Ditto services
|   FSTA      +FDR system backup status
|   JOBSC     +Job/Scan services
|   JSX       +JES/328X print services
|   NWR       +NW LAN restore services
|   QW        +Quickref message services
|   SILO      +MIM tape management services
|   TLM       +TLMS tape management services
|   VTPRNT    +VTP  vtam print management services
|   ZEK       +ZEKE the scheduler
+
%Systems support services
|   PMACB     +Ca/Pma Charge Back
|   PMADM     +Ca/Pma Data Manager
|   BMCM      +Database Activity Monitor
|   DSN       +Database 2
|   HCD       +Hardware Configuration Definition services
|   ISM       +Interactive Storage Management Facility
|   IXFP      +Iceberg Extended Facilities Product
|   JPU       +CICS Production Forward Recovery Facility
|   MNV       +Boole & Babbage Mainview Manager services
|   PER       +Boole & Babbage Performance Manager services
|   RAC       +Resource Access Control Facility security management
|   RMF       +Resource Measurement Facility
|   SLR       +Service Level Reporter
|   SMP       +System Modification Program / Extended services
+
%Librarian/CCF services
|   LIBRP     +Librarian main menu
|   LIBE      +Librarian edit
|   LIBRM     +Librarian restore test member
|   COMPB     +Batch Librarian compile
|   COMPC     +CICS Librarian compile
|   CCF       +Change Control Facility main menu
|   CCFO      +CCF open request
|   CCFA      +CCF assign request
|   CCFD      +CCF display request
|   CCFLO     +CCF logout request
|   CCFLB     +CCF logout request via batch submit job
|   CCFLI     +CCF login request
|   CCFC      +CCF close request
|   CCFR      +CCF reports
|   CCFM      +CCF movement status
|   CCFJ      +CCF job status
|   CCFU      +CCF utilities
|   CCFAD     +CCF administration
|   CCFS      +CCF librarian scan
|   CCFT      +CCF tutorial
|   DB2B      +Batch DB2 Librarian compile
|   DB2C      +CICS DB2 Librarian compile
|   C370      +C compiler
+
%Exit services
|   LOGOFF    +Logoff TSO/E
|   LOGON     +Logoff and re-Logon with the same TSO/E userid
|   LOGOFFON  +Terminate ISPF/PDF and then re-enter ISPF/PDF
)INIT
  .HELP = ISR00003
  &ZPRIM = YES        /* ALWAYS A PRIMARY OPTION MENU      */
  &ZHTOP = ISR00003   /* TUTORIAL TABLE OF CONTENTS        */
  &ZHINDEX = ISR91000 /* TUTORIAL INDEX - 1ST PAGE         */
  &ZSCLMPRJ = &Z      /* TUTORIAL INDEX - 1ST PAGE         */
  VPUT (ZHTOP,ZHINDEX,ZSCLMPRJ) PROFILE
)PROC
&ZQ = &Z
  IF (&ZCMD ¬= ' ')
    &ZQ = TRUNC(&ZCMD,'.')
    IF (&ZQ = ' ')
      .MSG = ISRU000
  &ZSEL = TRANS( &ZQ
                0,'PANEL(ISPOPTA)'
                1,'PGM(ISRBRO) PARM(ISRBRO01)'
                2,'PGM(ISREDIT) PARM(P,ISREDM01)'
                3,'PANEL(ISRUTIL)'
                6,'PGM(ISRPTC)'
                7,'PGM(ISPYXDR) PARM(ISR) NOCHECK'
                T,'PGM(ISPTUTOR) PARM(ISR00000)'
                PRIM,' '
              ' ',' '
                END,'EXIT'
                X,'EXIT'
                *,'?' )
  &ZTRAIL = .TRAIL
)END

@------------#Charming Shoppes ISPF/PDF Master Application Menu@------------
+
%OPTION  ===>_ZCMD
+
% System:+&ZSYSID%Userid:+&ZUSER    %LogonProc:+&ZLOGON    %Time:+&ZTIME
?SAREA --------------------------------------------------------------------?
)AREA SAREA
%Application development services
|   BR        +Browse source data
|   ED        +Edit source data

|   DAT       +Dataset services

|   SO        +Display JES2 output queue
|   SPR       +Display JES2 system printers
|   SST       +Display JES2 job status
+
%ISPF/PDF services
|   CMDA      +Command application table services
|   DIAL      +Dialog testing services
|   ISPFPARM  +ISPF terminal and user parameters
|   STA       +Reset ISPF/PDF library statistics
|   TUT       +ISPF/PDF tutorial
+
%Operations support
|   ABR       +FDR/ABR backup restore services
|   APCDDS    +Apcdds report balancer services
|   APC       +Apcdoc services
|   DISP      +Dispatch services
|   DITT      +Ditto services
|   JOBSC     +Job/Scan services
|   JSX       +JES/328X print services
|   NWR       +NW LAN restore services
|   QW        +Quickref message services
|   TLM       +TLMS tape management services
|   ZEK       +ZEKE the scheduler
|   FSTA      +FDR system backup status
+
%Systems support services
|   PMACB     +Ca/Pma Charge Back
|   PMADM     +Ca/Pma Data Manager
|   BMCM      +Database Activity Monitor
|   DSN       +Database 2
|   HCD       +Hardware Configuration Definition services
|   ISM       +Interactive Storage Management Facility
|   JPU       +CICS Production Forward Recovery Facility
|   MNV       +Boole & Babbage Mainview Manager services
|   PER       +Boole & Babbage Performance Manager services
|   RAC       +Resource Access Control Facility security management
|   RMF       +Resource Measurement Facility
|   SLR       +Service Level Reporter

+
%Librarian/CCF services
|   LIBRP     +Librarian main menu
|   LIBE      +Librarian edit
|   LIBRM     +Librarian restore test member
|   COMPB     +Batch Librarian compile
|   COMPC     +CICS Librarian compile

|   CCFO      +CCF open request
|   CCFA      +CCF assign request
|   CCFD      +CCF display request
|   CCFLO     +CCF logout request
|   CCFLB     +CCF logout request via batch submit job
|   CCFLI     +CCF login request
|   CCFC      +CCF close request
|   CCFR      +CCF reports
|   CCFM      +CCF movement status

|   CCFU      +CCF utilities
|   CCFAD     +CCF administration
|   CCFS      +CCF librarian scan
|   CCFT      +CCF tutorial
|   DB2B      +Batch DB2 Librarian compile
|   DB2C      +CICS DB2 Librarian compile
+
%Exit services
|   LOGOFF    +Logoff TSO/E
|   LOGON     +Logoff and re-Logon with the same TSO/E userid
|   LOGOFFON  +Terminate ISPF/PDF and then re-enter ISPF/PDF
)INIT
  .HELP = ISR00003
  &ZPRIM = YES        /* ALWAYS A PRIMARY OPTION MENU      */
  &ZHTOP = ISR00003   /* TUTORIAL TABLE OF CONTENTS        */
  &ZHINDEX = ISR91000 /* TUTORIAL INDEX - 1ST PAGE         */
  &ZSCLMPRJ = &Z      /* TUTORIAL INDEX - 1ST PAGE         */
  VPUT (ZHTOP,ZHINDEX,ZSCLMPRJ) PROFILE
)PROC
&ZQ = &Z
  IF (&ZCMD ¬= ' ')
    &ZQ = TRUNC(&ZCMD,'.')
    IF (&ZQ = ' ')
      .MSG = ISRU000
  &ZSEL = TRANS( &ZQ
                0,'PANEL(ISPOPTA)'
                1,'PGM(ISRBRO) PARM(ISRBRO01)'
                2,'PGM(ISREDIT) PARM(P,ISREDM01)'
                3,'PANEL(ISRUTIL)'
                6,'PGM(ISRPTC)'

                PRIM,' '
              ' ',' '
                END,'EXIT'
                X,'EXIT'
                *,'?' )
  &ZTRAIL = .TRAIL
)END

@------------#Charming Shoppes ISPF/PDF Master Application Menu@------------
+
%OPTION  ===>_ZCMD
+
% System:+&ZSYSID%Userid:+&ZUSER    %LogonProc:+&ZLOGON    %Time:+&ZTIME
?SAREA --------------------------------------------------------------------?
)AREA SAREA
%Application development services
|   BR        +Browse source data
|   COBT      +Cobol II test
|   ED        +Edit source data
|   LIBRA     +Library PDS(E) member services
|   DAT       +Dataset services

|   IAM       +IAM dataset utilities

%Spool Display and Search Facility

%ISPF/PDF services

|   TUT       +ISPF/PDF tutorial

%Operations support

|   JOBSC     +Job/Scan services
|   TLM       +TLMS tape management services
+
%Database 2 support

|   DB2I      +Perform Database 2 Interactive functions
|   QMFA      +Query Management Facility Production System A
|   QMFB      +Query Management Facility Production System B

+
%Librarian/CCF services

|   LIBE      +Librarian edit

|   COMPC     +CICS Librarian compile

%Exit services

)INIT
  .HELP = ISR00003
  &ZPRIM = YES        /* ALWAYS A PRIMARY OPTION MENU      */
  &ZHTOP = ISR00003   /* TUTORIAL TABLE OF CONTENTS        */
  &ZHINDEX = ISR91000 /* TUTORIAL INDEX - 1ST PAGE         */

)PROC
&ZQ = &Z

    IF (&ZQ = ' ')

                PRIM,' '
              ' ',' '
                END,'EXIT'
                X,'EXIT'
                *,'?' )
  &ZTRAIL = .TRAIL
)END

)ATTR

  % TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(HIGH) SKIP(ON)

)BODY
%---------  BUILDING DEPOSIT LIB/CCF TURNOVER BACKOUT SERVICES ----------------
%COMMAND ===>_ZCMD                                                     +
+
+
% ACCOUTING CODE    ===>_ACCTCDE         +
+
% WORK ORDER NUMBER ===>_WORKORDR+   (WO......)
+
+
% BACKOUT OPTION    ===>_Z+          ( 1 = ALL | 2 = MEMBER SELECTION )
)INIT
 .ZVARS = '(BKOPT)'
 IF (&ZERRMSG ¬= ' ') .MSG = &ZERRMSG
)PROC
  VER (&ACCTCDE,NONBLANK)
  VER (&WORKORDR,NONBLANK)
  VER (&BKOPT,NONBLANK)
  VER (&BKOPT,RANGE,1,2)
)END

)ATTR
  ! TYPE(OUTPUT)  INTENS(HIGH) SKIP(ON)

)BODY
%---- BUILDING DEPOSIT CCF BACKOUT FOR &WORKORDR &MEMTYPE MEMBERS PANEL ---
%COMMAND ===>_ZCMD                                                     +
+
% ( to select backout member(s) - enter an "S" next to member ) ...
% ( hit the ENTER to continue for next panel members | PF3 to QUIT/CANCEL )
+
+   &MEM1  >_Z+     &MEM2  >_Z+     &MEM3  >_Z+     &MEM4  >_Z+
+   &MEM5  >_Z+     &MEM6  >_Z+     &MEM7  >_Z+     &MEM8  >_Z+
+   &MEM9  >_Z+     &MEM10 >_Z+     &MEM11 >_Z+     &MEM12 >_Z+
+   &MEM13 >_Z+     &MEM14 >_Z+     &MEM15 >_Z+     &MEM16 >_Z+
+   &MEM17 >_Z+     &MEM18 >_Z+     &MEM19 >_Z+     &MEM20 >_Z+
+   &MEM21 >_Z+     &MEM22 >_Z+     &MEM23 >_Z+     &MEM24 >_Z+
+   &MEM25 >_Z+     &MEM26 >_Z+     &MEM27 >_Z+     &MEM28 >_Z+
+   &MEM29 >_Z+     &MEM30 >_Z+     &MEM31 >_Z+     &MEM32 >_Z+
+   &MEM33 >_Z+     &MEM34 >_Z+     &MEM35 >_Z+     &MEM36 >_Z+
+   &MEM37 >_Z+     &MEM38 >_Z+     &MEM39 >_Z+     &MEM40 >_Z+
+   &MEM41 >_Z+     &MEM42 >_Z+     &MEM43 >_Z+     &MEM44 >_Z+
+   &MEM45 >_Z+     &MEM46 >_Z+     &MEM47 >_Z+     &MEM48 >_Z+
+   &MEM49 >_Z+     &MEM50 >_Z+     &MEM51 >_Z+     &MEM52 >_Z+
+   &MEM53 >_Z+     &MEM54 >_Z+     &MEM55 >_Z+     &MEM56 >_Z+
)INIT
 .ZVARS = '(SM1 SM2 SM3 SM4 SM5 SM6 SM7 SM8 SM9 SM10 SM11 SM12 SM13 +
           SM14 SM15 SM16 SM17 SM18 SM19 SM20 SM21 SM22 SM23 SM24 SM25 +

%------ BUILDING DEPOSIT LIB/CCF Q/A BATCH ASSEMBLE/COMPILE SERVICES -----------
%COMMAND ===>_ZCMD                                                     +
+
% LIBRARIAN MASTER DATASET:
+     PROJECT ===>_LIBPRJ  +
+     GROUP   ===>_LIBGRP  +
+     TYPE    ===>_LIBTYP  +
+     MEMBER  ===>_MEMBER  +         ACCOUNT CODE:_ACCTCDE         +
+
% SELECT COMPILE TYPE ===>_Z+ (1 THRU 6)
%     1.+  ASSEMBLE/LINKEDT BAL PROGRAM
%     2.+  COMPILE/LINKEDT COBOL PROGRAM
%     3.+  COMPILE/LINKEDT COBOL-II PROGRAM
%     4.+  COMPILE/LINKEDT DYL280 PROGRAM
%     5.+  COMPILE/LINKEDT RPGII PROGRAM
%     6.+  COMPILE/LINKEDT RPGIAUTO PROGRAM
+
+ COBOL COMPILE OPTIONS:
+ _CP                                                          +|
+ COBOL2 COMPILE OPTIONS:
+ _C2P                                                          +|
+ LOADLIB ===>_CCFLOAD                                     +|
+
%  ENTER KEY = SUBMIT - PF3|PF15 = END/CANCEL - PF1|PF13 = MESSAGE HELP.
)INIT
  .ZVARS = '(COMPTYP)'
  .HELP = HPCCFQA
 IF (&ZERRMSG ¬= ' ') .MSG = &ZERRMSG
  IF (&CURSOR = ' ')
    &CURSOR = MEMBER
    IF (&LIBTYP = ' ')
      &CURSOR = LIBTYP
    IF (&LIBGRP = ' ')
      &CURSOR = LIBGRP
    IF (&LIBPRJ = ' ')
      &CURSOR = LIBPRJ
    .CURSOR = &CURSOR
    &COMPTYP = ' '
)PROC
  VER (&LIBPRJ,DSNAME)
  VER (&LIBGRP,DSNAME)
  VER (&LIBTYP,DSNAME)
  VER (&MEMBER,NAME)
  VER (&ACCTCDE,NONBLANK,PICT,NNNNNNNNNNNNNNNN)
  VER (&COMPTYP,NONBLANK)
  VER (&COMPTYP,RANGE,1,6)
  VER (&CCFLOAD,NONBLANK)
  VPUT (LIBPRJ,LIBGRP,LIBTYP) PROFILE
)END

HPCLOSE.text:
)ATTR DEFAULT(%¦_)
    ¬ TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(LOW) COLOR(BLUE)
    @ TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(TURQ)
    _ TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(YELLOW)
    $ TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(WHITE)
    # TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(RED)
    * TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(PINK)
    % TYPE(INPUT) INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(RED)
)BODY
$---------------  BUILDING DEPOSIT LBCLOSE HELP TUTORIAL  ----------------------
*COMMAND$===>%ZCMD                                                             $
¬
   This service facility is designed to facilitate the CA-LIBRARIAN LIB/CCF
   CLOSE of Change Request Work Order ( CR/WO ).
   All screen fields must be completed with required data in order for the
   LIB/CCF CLOSE to be performed.
   The ANALYSIS records ( up to 12 continuous 64 characters ), at least
   one (1) entry must be specified - desription of problen or reason for change.
   The ROUTINES AFFECTED records ( up to 15 continuous 62 characters ),
   at least one (1) entry must be specified - list of modules for CR/WO.
   The SYSTEM TESTS MODIFIED date - form: mm/dd/yy.
   The SYSTEM TESTS VERIFIED date - form: mm/dd/yy.
   The SYSTEM TESTS ADDED/MODIFIED ( from 1 to 3 continuous 46 characters ),
   at least one (1) entry must be specified - default value: NONE.
   The NEW USER INPUT ( from 1 to 3 continuous 58 characters ),
   at least one (1) entry must be specified - default value: NONE.
   The NEW USER OUTPUT ( from 1 to 3 continuous 57 characters ),
   at least one (1) entry must be specified - default value: NONE.
   The DOCUMENTATION CHANGES ( from 1 to 3 continuous 51 characters ),
   at least one (1) entry must be specified - default value: NONE.
   After keying required information from the displayed panel:
   1. depress the ENTER KEY or keyboard equivalent.
   2. depress the PF3 KEY or keyboard equivalent.
)PROC
)END

HPCOMPAR.text:
)ATTR DEFAULT(%¦_)
    ¬ TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(LOW) COLOR(BLUE)

    % TYPE(INPUT) INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(RED)
)BODY
$--------------  BUILDING DEPOSIT LBCOMPARE HELP TUTORIAL  ---------------------
*COMMAND$===>%ZCMD                                                             $
¬
   This service facility is designed to facilitate the CA-LIBRARIAN
   LBCOMPARE of Librarian Master modules for turnover processing.
   Only the current archive level 0 module in the QA Librarian and the
   PROD Librarian Master will be compared.

   Panel display requirements:
   1. Enter the required fields to specify the Librarian Master number,
      and the module name to be compared.
   2. The MVS jobname and the account code fields are optional entries.
      The defaults are displayed on the screen.
   3. Depress the ENTER KEY when screen data is supplied to submit the job.
      * The panel display will remain and a message informing you that
        the compare job was submitted.
   4. Enter the required screen data until all selections are complete.
   5. Depress the PF3 KEY to terminate the LBCOMPARE screen session.

#          -- E N D   H E L P   P A N E L   ... PF3 to return
)PROC
)END

HPLOGO01.text:
)ATTR DEFAULT(%¦_)
    ¬ TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(LOW) COLOR(BLUE)
    @ TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(TURQ)
    _ TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(YELLOW)
    $ TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(WHITE)
    # TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(RED)
    * TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(PINK)
    % TYPE(INPUT) INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(RED)
)BODY
$---------------  BUILDING DEPOSIT LBLOGOUT HELP TUTORIAL  ---------------------
*COMMAND$===>%ZCMD                                                             $
¬
   This service facility is designed to facilitate the CA-LIBRARIAN LIB/CCF
   logout of modules for a new application system that does not already
   exist in the PROD Librarian Master datasets.
   A LIB/CCF LOGOUT "must" be performed for each module to be processed by
   a subsequent LOGIN for movement into the PROD Librarian Master datasets.
   The following requirements must be met in order to utilize this utility:
   1. A Change Request Workorder ( CR/WO ) must be generated via the LIB/CCF
      CCFOpen - OPEN  ( open a change request ).
   2. The CR/WO ) must be assigned to a programmer via the LIB/CCF option 2
      CCFAssign  ( assign a change request ).
   A panel will be presented to supply the following information:
   1. The CR/WO number from the LIB/CCF OPEN change request processing.
   2. The application system to which the modules belong.
   3. Module abstract for history information.
   A panel will be presented to select by module langcode type and supply
   the module names associated with the CR/WO.
   After keying required information from the displayed panel:
   1. depress the ENTER KEY or keyboard equivalent.
   2. depress the PF3 KEY or keyboard equivalent.

#                  -- continued on next panel --  hit enter ...
)PROC
  IF (&ZCMD = ' ') &ZCONT = HPLOGO02
  &ZUP = HPLOGO01
)END

HPLOGO02.text:
)ATTR DEFAULT(%¦_)
    ¬ TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(LOW) COLOR(BLUE)
    @ TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(TURQ)
    _ TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(YELLOW)
    $ TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(WHITE)
    # TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(RED)
    * TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(PINK)
    % TYPE(INPUT) INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(RED)
)BODY
$---------------  BUILDING DEPOSIT LBLOGOUT HELP TUTORIAL  ---------------------
*COMMAND$===>%ZCMD                                                             $
¬
   * Extreme care should be taken in specifying the module names to insure
     that specified names do not conflict with alreay existent module names
     in the target PROD Librarian Master dataset.

   * If a module name specified via this LBLOGOUT facility already exists on
     the target PROD Librarian Master dataset, an attempt will be made to copy
     the module into the corresponding TEST Librarian Master dataset as a
     normal LOGOUT module movement process. This will produce a failure or
     abnormal termination if the member already exists on the TEST Librarian
     Master dataset or if the module is already in a LOGOUT status with
     another opened CR/WO.

   * Extreme care should be taken in specifying the module names from the
     proper LANGCODE panel. Specifying a module name from the wrong LANGCODE
     panel will result in the wrong CCF skeleton JCL to be invoked during
     turnover LOGIN module movement processing and the wrong LIB/CCF library
     chain to be used during processing.

$
$
#                  -- continued on next panel --  hit enter ...
)PROC
  IF (&ZCMD = ' ') &ZCONT = HPLOGO03
  &ZUP = HPLOGO02
)END

¬  A batch job will be submitted to invoke the LIB/CCF batch utility program
¬  ( $CCFB102 ) to perform the CCF LOGOUT.
¬  The job name will be the CR/WO number and should be reviewed via SDSF from
¬  the JES2 HELD output queue.

¬  LIB-NR   MODULE TYPE    LIBRARIAN MASTER DATASET NAME

#                 E N D   O F   H E L P   P A N E L
)PROC
)END

LBCOMPAR.text:
)ATTR
  ! TYPE(OUTPUT)  INTENS(HIGH) SKIP(ON)
  + TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(LOW) SKIP(ON)
  % TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(HIGH) SKIP(ON)
  _ TYPE(INPUT)   INTENS(HIGH) CAPS(ON)
)BODY
%------ BUILDING DEPOSIT LIB/CCF LIBRARIAN MODULE COMPARE SERVICES  ------------
%COMMAND ===>_ZCMD                                                     +
+
% ENTER THE FOLLOWING REQUIRED SCREEN DATA:
+  * INPUT LIBRARIAN MASTER DATASET NUMBER.
+  * MEMBER NAME TO BE COMPARED IN THE LIBRARIAN MASTER.
+
% ENTER THE FOLLOWING OPTIONAL SCREEN DATA:
+  * MVS JOB NAME TO BE SUBMITTED.
+  * ACCOUNT CODE TO BE USED FOR SUBMITTED JOB.
+
% LIBRARIAN MASTER DATASET SELECTION LIST:
%     1.+  COPY BOOK LIBRARIAN MASTER.
%     2.+  JCL LIBRARIAN MASTER.
%     3.+  PROCLIB LIBRARIAN MASTER.
%     4.+  RAMIS LIBRARIAN MASTER.
%     5.+  SOURCE PROGRAM LIBRARIAN MASTER.
%     6.+  SYSIN LIBRARIAN MASTER.
+
+     LIBRARIAN MASTER ===>_M+    LIBRARIAN MEMBER ===>_MEMBER  +
+
+     MVS JOBNAME ===>_JOBNAME +  ACCOUNT CODE:_ACCTCDE         +
+
% HIT ENTER TO SUBMIT JOB - HIT PF3 WHEN SELECTIONS COMPLETE.
)INIT
  .HELP = HPCOMPAR
 IF (&ZERRMSG ¬= ' ') .MSG = &ZERRMSG
    &CURSOR = M
    .CURSOR = &CURSOR
)PROC
  VER (&M,RANGE,1,6)
  VER (&MEMBER,NAME)
  VER (&JOBNAME,NONBLANK)
  VER (&ACCTCDE,NONBLANK,PICT,NNNNNNNNNNNNNNNN)
)END

LBLOHLP1.text:
)ATTR DEFAULT(%¦_)
    ¬ TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(LOW) COLOR(BLUE)
    @ TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(TURQ)
    _ TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(YELLOW)
    $ TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(WHITE)
    # TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(RED)
    * TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(PINK)
    % TYPE(INPUT) INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(RED)
)BODY
$---------------  BUILDING DEPOSIT LBLOGOUT HELP TUTORIAL  ---------------------
*COMMAND$===>%ZCMD                                                             $
¬
   This service facility is designed to facilitate the CA-LIBRARIAN LIB/CCF
   logout of modules for a new application system and new modules that do not
   already exist in the PROD Librarian Master datasets.
   A LIB/CCF LOGOUT "must" be performed for each module to be processed by
   a subsequent LOGIN for movement into the PROD Librarian Master datasets.
   The following requirements must be met in order to utilize this utility:
   1. A Change Request Workorder ( CR/WO ) must be generated via the LIB/CCF
      CCFOpen - OPEN  ( open a change request ).
   2. The CR/WO ) must be assigned to a programmer via the LIB/CCF option 2
      CCFAssign  ( assign a change request ).
   A panel will be presented to supply the following information:
   1. The CR/WO number from the LIB/CCF OPEN change request processing.
   2. The application system to which the modules belong.
   3. Module abstract for history information.
   A panel will be presented to select by module LANGCODE type and LCDF to
   specify the module names associated with the CR/WO.
   depress the ENTER KEY or keyboard equivalent.
#                  -- continued on next panel --  hit enter ...
)PROC
  IF (&ZCMD = ' ') &ZCONT = LBLOHLP2
  &ZUP = LBLOHLP1
)END

LBLOHLP2.text:
)ATTR DEFAULT(%¦_)
    ¬ TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(LOW) COLOR(BLUE)
    @ TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(TURQ)
    _ TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(YELLOW)
    $ TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(WHITE)
    # TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(RED)
    * TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(PINK)
    % TYPE(INPUT) INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(RED)
)BODY
$---------------  BUILDING DEPOSIT LBLOGOUT HELP TUTORIAL  ---------------------
*COMMAND$===>%ZCMD                                                             $
¬
   * Extreme care should be taken in specifying the module names to insure
     that specified names do not conflict with alreay existent module names
     in the target PROD Librarian Master dataset.

   * If a module name specified via this LBLOGOUT facility already exists on
     the target PROD Librarian Master dataset, an attempt will be made to copy
     the module into the corresponding TEST Librarian Master dataset as a
     normal LOGOUT module movement process. This will produce a failure or
     abnormal termination if the member already exists on the TEST Librarian
     Master dataset or if the module is already in a LOGOUT status with
     another opened CR/WO.

   * Extreme care should be taken in specifying the module names from the
     LANGCODE LCDF panel. Specifying a module name with the wrong LANGCODE
     will result in the wrong CCF skeleton JCL being invoked during movement
     processing to the QA or PROD libraries.
     Specifying the wrong LCDF from the selection panel will result in a CCF
     failure during movement processing due to the improper library chain
     definition causing a module not found condition.

#                  -- continued on next panel --  hit enter ...
)PROC
  IF (&ZCMD = ' ') &ZCONT = LBLOHLP3
  &ZUP = LBLOHLP2
)END

LBLOHLP3.text:
)ATTR DEFAULT(%¦_)
    ¬ TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(LOW) COLOR(BLUE)
    @ TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(TURQ)
    _ TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(YELLOW)
    $ TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(WHITE)
    # TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(RED)
    * TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(PINK)
    % TYPE(INPUT) INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(RED)
)BODY
$---------------  BUILDING DEPOSIT LBLOGOUT HELP TUTORIAL  ---------------------
*COMMAND$===>%ZCMD                                                             $
¬
¬  The LCDF ( Library Chain Definition ) corresponds to the numbers used in the
¬  CCF LOGOUT panels presented with the CCFLO command facility.
¬
¬  Only 1 LANGCODE and LCDF can be specified for the modules from the selection
¬  panel. This facility will issue a message to acknowledge the acceptance of
¬  LOGOUT parameters - depress the "ENTER KEY" to continue processing.
¬  This facility will loop and present the selection panels again, so that the
¬  next LANGCODE, LCDF, and module names can be specified.
¬  After all entries are complete, depress the PF3 key to terminate the loop
¬  and submit the logout job for processing CLASS=P on the SYSA system.
¬
¬  A batch job will be submitted to invoke the LIB/CCF batch utility program
¬  ( $CCFB102 ) to perform the CCF LOGOUT.
¬  The job name will be the CR/WO number and should be reviewed via SDSF from
¬  the JES2 HELD output queue.


$
$
#                 E N D   O F   H E L P   P A N E L
)PROC
)END

)ATTR

%---------  BUILDING DEPOSIT CA-LIBRARIAN SCAN UTILITY SERVICES  --------------
%COMMAND ===>_ZCMD                                                     +
+
+     JOBNAME ===>_Z       +   JOBCLASS ===>_Z+   ( C|W|8|T|B|V|Q )
+
+     START MEMBER ===>_BEGMOD  +    END MEMBER ===>_ENDMOD  +
+       ( * default - all members on the Librarian Master will be scanned )
+
+     START COLUMN ===>_SC+          END COLUMN ===>_EC+
+
% LIBRARIAN MASTER STATUS ===>_Z+  (1 THRU 5)   ACCOUNT CODE:_ACCTCDE         +
%     1.+  SCAN TEST LIBRARIAN MASTER
%     2.+  SCAN TURNOVER LIBRARIAN MASTER
%     3.+  SCAN QA LIBRARIAN MASTER
%     4.+  SCAN EMERGENCY LIBRARIAN MASTER
%     5.+  SCAN PRODUCTION LIBRARIAN MASTER
+

%     1.+  SCAN COPYBOOK MEMBERS           %2.+  SCAN JCL MEMBERS
%     3.+  SCAN PROC MEMBERS               %4.+  SCAN RAMIS MEMBERS
%     5.+  SCAN SOURCE PROGRAM MEMBERS     %6.+  SCAN SYSIN MEMBERS
%  PF3 = ( End/Cancel )  ***  ENTER key = ( Continue/Submit )
)INIT
  .ZVARS = '(JOBNAME JC LIBSTAT LIBTYPE)'
 IF (&ZERRMSG ¬= ' ') .MSG = &ZERRMSG
)PROC

  VER (&ACCTCDE,NONBLANK,PICT,NNNNNNNNNNNNNNNN)
  VER (&BEGMOD,NONBLANK)
  VER (&ENDMOD,NONBLANK)
  VER (&SC,NONBLANK)
  VER (&EC,NONBLANK)
  VER (&LIBSTAT,NONBLANK)
  VER (&LIBTYPE,NONBLANK)
)END

LIBRHPNL.text:
)ATTR DEFAULT(%¦_)
    ¬ TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(LOW) COLOR(BLUE)
    @ TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(TURQ)
    _ TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(YELLOW)
    $ TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(WHITE)
    # TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(RED)
    % TYPE(INPUT) INTENS(HIGH) CAPS(ON)
)BODY
$-------- BUILDING DEPOSIT LIBRARIAN MASTER ALLOCATE/FORMAT HELP PANEL ---------
*COMMAND$===>%ZCMD                                                             $
¬
   This service facility is designed to facilitate the ALLOCATION/FORMATTING/
   COPYING/RE-CATALOGING of a "EXISTING" Librarian Master dataset.

   The resulting job that gets submitted, via ISPF dialog skeleton JCL, will
   be submitted to the SYSA production system with initiator CLASS=S.

   It is important to note that any Librarian Master specified for re-allocation
   "MUST" not be in use or enqueued by any TSO user, JOB, or Started Task.
   The jobstream will not complete successfully if an enqueue exists, because
   the first jobstep "RENAME1" attempts to perform an IDCAMS ALTER/RENAME of
   the original Master dataset.

   All jobsteps should complete with a Condition Code of "0".

$  After entering required screen fields data, DEPRESS the ENTER KEY
   to SUBMIT the job to SYSA.

#      E N D   O F   H E L P   P A N E L     ( PF3 = RETURN )
)PROC
)END

LIBRPANL.text:
)ATTR
  ! TYPE(OUTPUT)  INTENS(HIGH) SKIP(ON)
  + TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(LOW) SKIP(ON)
  % TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(HIGH) SKIP(ON)
  _ TYPE(INPUT)   INTENS(HIGH) CAPS(ON)
)BODY
%-------  BUILDING DEPOSIT ALLOCATE/FORMAT/COPY LIBRARIAN SERVICES  ---------
%COMMAND ===>_ZCMD                                                     +
+
+   JOBNAME ===>_Z       +         ACCOUNT CODE:_ACCTCDE         +
+
%   LIBRARIAN MASTER LCDF TYPE ===>_Z +   (1 thru 10)
%    1.+ARCHIVE      %2.+BACKOUT   %3.+EMERGENCY   %4.+HISTORY
%    5.+PRODUCTION   %6.+Q/A       %7.+REJECT      %8.+TECH SERVICES
%    9.+TEST         %10.+TURNOVER
+
%   LIBRARIAN MASTER MEMBER TYPE ===>_Z +   (1 thru 9)
%    1.+COPYBOOK     %2.+JCL       %3.+PROC        %4.+RAMIS/FOCUS
%    5.+SOURCE PGM   %6.+SYSIN     %7.+TABLE       %8.+WRITER
%    9.+SYSTEM CONTROL
+
%   LIBRARIAN MASTER SPACE ALLOCATION ===>_Z  +   (in %CYLS+ up to 999)
%   * NOTE: +hit PF1 for job execution information before submitting job.
+
%   LIBRARIAN MASTER VOLUME ALLOCATION ===>_VOL   +   (default SMS volume)
+
%   PF1=HELP - PF3=End/Cancel - ENTER key=Continue/Submit
)INIT
  .ZVARS = '(JN N1 N2 SPACE)'
  .HELP = LIBRHPNL
 IF (&ZERRMSG ¬= ' ') .MSG = &ZERRMSG
)PROC
  VER (&JN,NONBLANK)
  VER (&ACCTCDE,NONBLANK,PICT,NNNNNNNNNNNNNNNN)
  VER (&N1,NONBLANK)
  VER (&N2,NONBLANK)
  VER (&SPACE,NONBLANK)
  VER (&N1,RANGE,1,10)
  VER (&N2,RANGE,1,9)
  VER (&SPACE,RANGE,1,999)
)END

%---------- BUILDING DEPOSIT NETWARE SYSTEMS LAN SERVER RESTORE SERVICES -------
%COMMAND ===>_ZCMD                                                     +
+
% LAN SERVER LOGON-ID ===>_LANID  +   %LAN SERVER PASSWORD ===>@LANPW   +
+
% SELECT LAN SERVER RESTORE TYPE ===>_Z+   ( 1 | 2 | 3 )
%   1.+ FILE RESTORE     %2.+ DIRECTORY RESTORE     %3.+ FULL VOLUME RESTORE
+
% SELECT LAN SERVER RESTORE MODE ===>_Z+   ( 1 | 2 )
%   1.+ INCREMENTAL ( DAILY BACKUP )    %2.+ FULL ( WEEKLY BACKUP)

% SELECT LAN SERVER FOR RESTORE ===>_Z + (1 THRU 14)
% 1. CS1   5. C4A    9. C6B      13. CS1-REA
% 2. CS2   6. C4B   10. COM      14. FIN-APPL
% 3. MIS   7. CS5   11. CS6-MAG
% 4. FIN   8. C6A   12. CS6-POS
+
% DIRECTORY PATH NAME ===>_RESTDPN                                           +|
+
% ENTER FILE NAME TO BE RESTORED ===>_RESTFN      +
+ ( ENTER KEY = PROCESS  *  PF1|PF13 = HELP  *  PF3|PF15 = QUIT/CANCEL )
+
)INIT
  .ZVARS = '(RT RM LAN)'
  .HELP = NWRSTHP1
 IF (&ZERRMSG ¬= ' ') .MSG = &ZERRMSG
)PROC
  VER (&LANID,NONBLANK)
  VER (&LANPW,NONBLANK)
  VER (&RT,NONBLANK)
  VER (&RT,RANGE,1,3)
  VER (&RM,NONBLANK)
  VER (&RM,RANGE,1,2)
  VER (&LAN,NONBLANK)
  VER (&LAN,RANGE,1,14)
  IF (&RT = 1)
    VER (&RESTDPN,NONBLANK)
    VER (&RESTFN,NONBLANK)
  IF (&RT = 2)

)END

+   &VOL5 ===>_Z+   &VOL6 ===>_Z+   &VOL7 ===>_Z+   &VOL8 ===>_Z+
+
% NOTE: VOLUME SELECTION IS REQUIRED ONLY IF RESTART MODE 1 IS SPECIFIED.
+ ( ENTER KEY = SELECT/CONTINUE   ***   PF3 | PF15 = QUIT/CANCEL )
+
+
)INIT
  .ZVARS = '(LBU BUT VBU1 VBU2 VBU3 VBU4 VBU5 VBU6 VBU7 VBU8)'
 IF (&ZERRMSG ¬= ' ') .MSG = &ZERRMSG
)PROC
  VER (&LBU,NONBLANK)
  VER (&LBU,RANGE,1,2)
  VER (&BUT,NONBLANK)
  VER (&BUT,RANGE,1,2)
)END

OWRSTPN1.text:
)ATTR
  ! TYPE(OUTPUT)  INTENS(HIGH) SKIP(ON)
  + TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(LOW) SKIP(ON)
  % TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(HIGH) SKIP(ON)
  _ TYPE(INPUT)   INTENS(HIGH) CAPS(ON)
  @ TYPE(INPUT)   INTENS(NON) CAPS(ON)
)BODY
%---------- BUILDING DEPOSIT NETWARE SYSTEMS LAN SERVER RESTORE SERVICES -------
%COMMAND ===>_ZCMD                                                     +
+
% LAN SERVER LOGON-ID ===>_LANID  +   %LAN SERVER PASSWORD ===>@LANPW   +
+
% SELECT LAN SERVER RESTORE TYPE ===>_Z+   ( 1 | 2 | 3 )
%   1.+ FILE RESTORE     %2.+ DIRECTORY RESTORE     %3.+ FULL VOLUME RESTORE
+
% SELECT LAN SERVER RESTORE MODE ===>_Z+   ( 1 | 2 )
%   1.+ INCREMENTAL ( DAILY BACKUP )    %2.+ FULL ( WEEKLY BACKUP)
+
% SELECT LAN SERVER FOR RESTORE ===>_Z + (1 THRU 12)
%   1. +COMM-SERVER     %2. +CS-SERVER1     %3. +CS-SERVER2
%   4. +CS3-MAGIC       %5. +CS3-POS        %6. +CS-SERVER3
%   7. +CS-DB1          %8. +CSI-SERVER     %9. +FINANCE-LAN
%   10.+MIS-TEST-LAN    %11.+SYS1 SERVER    %12.+CS-PDAD
+
% DIRECTORY PATH NAME ===>_RESTDPN                                           +|
+
% ENTER FILE NAME TO BE RESTORED ===>_RESTFN      +
+ ( ENTER KEY = PROCESS  *  PF1|PF13 = HELP  *  PF3|PF15 = QUIT/CANCEL )
+
)INIT
  .ZVARS = '(RT RM LAN)'
  .HELP = NWRSTHP1
 IF (&ZERRMSG ¬= ' ') .MSG = &ZERRMSG
)PROC
  VER (&LANID,NONBLANK)
  VER (&LANPW,NONBLANK)
  VER (&RT,NONBLANK)
  VER (&RT,RANGE,1,3)
  VER (&RM,NONBLANK)
  VER (&RM,RANGE,1,2)
  VER (&LAN,NONBLANK)
  VER (&LAN,RANGE,1,12)
  IF (&RT = 1)
    VER (&RESTDPN,NONBLANK)
    VER (&RESTFN,NONBLANK)
  IF (&RT = 2)
    VER (&RESTDPN,NONBLANK)
)END

)ATTR

%COMMAND ===>_ZCMD                                                     +

PBKSTAT.text:
)ATTR
  ! TYPE(OUTPUT)  INTENS(HIGH) SKIP(ON)
  + TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(LOW) SKIP(ON)
  @ TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(HIGH) SKIP(ON)
  $ TYPE(INPUT)   INTENS(HIGH) CAPS(ON)
)BODY
@----------------  Charming Shoppes Backup Status ------------------------------
@COMMAND ===>$ZCMD                                                     +
+
+
@ SELECT Search Criteria.
+
+
+  Night of                --->$s+
+
+       1:!datec     +
+
+       2:!datep     +
+
+  Show Complete           --->$c+
+
+       Failure+Active     --->$f+
+
+       Pending            --->$p+
+
+
@ PRESS ENTER for BACKUP STATUS, PF3 to END
+
+
+
)INIT
 IF (&ZERRMSG ¬= ' ') .MSG = &ZERRMSG
 .CURSOR = c
 &s = '1'
 &c = 'N'
 &f = 'Y'
 &p = 'Y'
)PROC
 VER(&s,NB, LIST 1,2 )
 VER(&c,NB, LIST Y,N )
 VER(&f,NB, LIST Y,N )
 VER(&p,NB, LIST Y,N )
)END

PNLANGCD.text:
)ATTR
  ! TYPE(OUTPUT)  INTENS(HIGH) SKIP(ON)
  + TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(LOW) SKIP(ON)
  % TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(HIGH) SKIP(ON)
  _ TYPE(INPUT)   INTENS(HIGH) CAPS(ON)
)BODY
%--------  BUILDING DEPOSIT LIB/CCF BATCH LOGOUT LANGCODE PANEL  --------------
%COMMAND ===>_ZCMD                                                     +
+
% SELECT LANGCODE TYPE FOR MODULE LOGOUT SELECTION ===>_Z + (1 THRU 16)
%     1.+  ASSEMBLE - BAL PROGRAM
%     2.+  BMSMAP   - CICS BMS MAP PROGRAM
%     3.+  CICSCOB  - COBOL CICS ONLINE PROGRAM
%     4.+  CICSCOB2 - COBOL2 CICS ONLINE PROGRAM
%     5.+  CICSCOPY - COBOL CICS PROGRAM  - TRANSLATE ONLY COPY BOOK
%     6.+  COBOL    - COBOL BATCH PROGRAM
%     7.+  COBOL2   - COBOL2 BATCH PROGRAM
%     8.+  COPY     - SOURCE COPY BOOK
%     9.+  DMSMAP   - CICS DMS MAP PROGRAM
%    10.+  DYL280   - DYLAKOR BATCH PROGRAM
%    11.+  JCL      - OS/MVS JCL
%    12.+  PROC     - OS/MVS JCL PROC
%    13.+  RAMIS    - RAMIS PROCEDURE
%    14.+  RPGIAUTO - RPGIAUTO SOURCE PROGRAM
%    15.+  RPGII    - RPGII SOURCE PROGRAM
%    16.+  SYSIN    - SYSIN PROGRAM DATA
+
)INIT
  .ZVARS = '(LANGTYP)'
  .HELP = HPLOGO01
)PROC
  VER (&LANGTYP,RANGE,1,16)
)END

PXREF.text:
)ATTR
  ! TYPE(OUTPUT)  INTENS(HIGH) SKIP(ON)
  + TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(LOW) SKIP(ON)
  @ TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(HIGH) SKIP(ON)
  $ TYPE(INPUT)   INTENS(HIGH) CAPS(ON)
)BODY
@-----------  Charming Shoppes Production Environment Cross Reference ----------
@COMMAND ===>$ZCMD                                                     +
@ Enter search criteria.
@ The percent or underscore characters may be used for generic searches.
@ The percent character represents zero or more characters.
@ The underscore character represents any one character.
@ A Jobname of "CICSPROD" may be entered, as part of a query,
@     to access production CICS file and program data.
@ A DSNAME of "*COPYBOOK*" (Copy members) or "*ZEKE*" (ZEKE events) may be used.
@ The Membername field may contain a PDS member name, a DISPATCH writer name,
@     a copybook name, a CICS transid, or an FCT file name (DDNAME).
+
+  Jobname or "CICSPROD"   --->$JOB     +  Acc/"DB2PGM"/"DYLPGM"--->$ACC   +
+
+  Procname                --->$PROC    +
+
+  Programname             --->$PROG    +
+
+  Datasetname or "*COPYBOOK*" or "*ZEKE*"
+                          --->$DSN                                         +
+  Membername/DSPTCH WTR name/Copybook name/CICS transid/FCT file name
+                          --->$MEM     +
)INIT
 IF (&ZERRMSG ¬= ' ') .MSG = &ZERRMSG
 .CURSOR = &CURSOR
)PROC
)END
